but when I run mpirun -np 3 python mpi_allreduce_test.py, the test failed

body:
I run mpirun -np 1 python mpi_allreduce_test.py ;the test pass.
but when I run mpirun -np 3 python mpi_allreduce_test.py, the test failed
```

rank 2: My output is 330772870.0
rank 2: Our output is 170543409.0
```
